Title: Kogi CP presents N52m to 27 families of fallen heroes in Kogi
Summary: Kogi CP presents N52m to 27 families of fallen heroes in Kogi . The Kogi State Police Command presented cheques under the Group Life Assurance Scheme and the Inspector General of Police Family Welfare Scheme .

Title: ‘One Woman One Bra,’ selected for screening at Venice International Film Festival
Summary: The Venice International Film Festival has announced its line-up for the 82nd edition . ‘One Woman One Bra’, a Kenyan-Nigerian film, will screen at the prestigious festival . The film is produced by Nigerian-born prolific filmmaker, Josh Joshah .

Title: FCC boss seeks equity in infrastructure, job opportunities
Summary: Acting Chairman of the Federal Character Commission (FCC), Kayode Oladele, has called for fair and equitable distribution of infrastructure projects and job opportunities nationwide . Mr. Kayode Oadele calls for equity in infrastructure, job opportunities .

Title: Lamido of Adamawa approves 2,000 hectares for modern agricultural hub
Summary: Lamido of Adamawa has approved the allocation of 2,000 hectares of fertile land for the establishment of a modern agricultural hub in Adamawa State . The move is a significant move to boost food security and youth employment .

Title: Police deny declaring actress Iyabo Ojo wanted
Summary: Police deny declaring actress Iyabo Ojo wanted by the Office of the Inspector-General of Police (IGP) Monitoring Unit . The Nigeria Police Force (NPF) has dismissed a viral ‘Wanted Person’ bulletin in circulation .

Title: World’s oldest person celebrates 116th birthday in UK
Summary: Caterham was due to mark the occasion quietly with her family, taking the day "at her own pace", the care home where she lives said .

Title: Tech-driven GinjaBet introduces rapper Blaqbonez as ambassador
Summary: Tech-driven betting platform GinjaBet introduces rapper Blaqbonez as its first brand ambassador . The platform has officially launched in Nigeria .

Title: 2027: Fresh crisis looms in PDP over zoning formula
Summary: As Southern State Chairmen, Ex-Governors, NASS Members, disown Gov. Diri’s Lagos meeting . The crisis of confidence in the Peoples Democratic Party PDP appears far from over .

Title: Iyabo Ojo not wanted – Police disown viral poster
Summary: Iyabo Ojo not wanted – Police disown viral poster . The widely circulated poster claimed a reward had been offered for information leading to her arrest .

Title: Culprits behind staged kidnappings deserve punishment  – Nwoko
Summary: Sen. Ned Nwoko (APC-Delta) has urged security agencies to ensure that culprits of staged kidnapping face the full weight of the law . He made the call in a statement on Thursday in Abuja, while frowning at growing trend of stage kidnapping .

Title: Asian markets mixed as investors await key speech
Summary: Tokyo’s Nikkei index closed lower for the second day in a row, while shares in Hong Kong were down 0.4 per cent in the final hour before the end of the session . US Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell is scheduled to deliver remarks Friday at the annual central bankers conference in Wyoming .

Title: EFCC, Immigration repatriate 51 foreign cybercrime convicts
Summary: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission and the Nigerian Immigration Service have repatriated 51 more foreign nationals convicted for cyber-terrorism and internet fraud . The latest group of deportees, according to the EFCC in a statement on Thursday, includes 50 Chinese nationals and one Tunisian . The repatriation brings the total number of convicted foreign nationals deported in

Title: Nwoko seeks stiffer penalties for staged kidnapping
Summary: Senator Ned Nwoko has urged security agencies to ensure that culprits of staged kidnapping face the full weight of the law . He made the call in a statement on Thursday in Abuja, while frowning at the growing trend of staged kidnappings . The Senator representing Delta North Senatorial District said the kidnapping is a reckless and criminal act

Title: World's oldest person celebrates 116th birthday in UK
Summary: Ethel Caterham turned 116 on August 21, 2025, months after the title of world’s oldest person passed to her following the death of Brazilian nun Inah Canabarro Lucas . The title of the oldest person ever is held by French woman Jeanne Calment, who lived to 122 years and 164 days before her death in

Title: PDP leaders disown Lagos zoning meeting, call it 'illegal, divisive
Summary: State Chairmen of the Peoples Democratic Party, former governors, National Assembly members and other key stakeholders from Southern Nigeria, have disowned a zoning meeting scheduled for Lagos today .
